short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension can provide you with option to keep notes per website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mindroast Tab Notes is an extension which provides users with ability to keep notes as per the website.
- You can create, remove your notes and get it across the browsers.
- You can add some reminders, which you might need afterwards.
- Generally users write notes at some place, which gets lost while we actually needs them. 
  With 
  Mindroast tab notes you will be able to get as soon as you open the website.
- Synced across tabs, means you will get the access of the notes on every tab you open for 
  that 
  website.
- Data is stored in your browsers local storage, so you don't need to worry about data 
  privacy.As a developer of the extension we can assure you that no data is stored at our 
  end.
